attributes.action: Improve security and police presence in all public areas and events
attributes.background: Due to the recent terror attacks this year. I believe it is necessary to improve security in population hotspots including random checks and metal detectors at public events, buildings (museums, landmarks, etc.) There should also be an improved police presence at popular public areas

rejection.details: This would be an operational matter for the police and other security services, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
